SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.message.notify

Class NotifyDraw

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.message.notify.NotifyMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.message.notify.NotifyDraw
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Serializable
public class NotifyDraw extends NotifyMessage
This class represents a notification message that is sent when a player draws a card.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    NotifyDraw.DrawType
    Enum representing the types of draws.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom)
    Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn from the resource or gold deck (used for the others players that didn't draw).
    NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom, int index, PlayableCard card)
    Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn (from the market).
    NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom, PlayableCard card)
    Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn from the resource or gold deck (used to show the card drawn to the player who draw).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PlayableCard
    getCard()
    Returns the card that was drawn.

    Returns the index of the card in the market.
    Symbol

    Returns the symbol representing the kingdom of the card.
    NotifyType
    getNotifyType()
    Retrieves the type of this message, which is NotifyType.DRAW.
    NotifyDraw.DrawType
    getWhere()
    Returns the draw type indicating where the card was drawn from.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotifyDraw

      public NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom)
      Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn from the resource or gold deck (used for the others players that didn't draw).
      Parameters:
      who - the player who drew the card
      where - the draw type indicating where the card was drawn from
      kingdom - the symbol representing the kingdom of the card

    • NotifyDraw

      public NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom, int index, PlayableCard card)
      Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn (from the market).
      Parameters:
      who - the player who drew the card
      where - the draw type indicating where the card was drawn from
      kingdom - the symbol representing the kingdom of the card
      index - the index of the card in the market
      card - the card that was drawn

    • NotifyDraw

      public NotifyDraw(PlayerColor who, NotifyDraw.DrawType where, Symbol kingdom, PlayableCard card)
      Constructs a new NotifyDraw message when a card is drawn from the resource or gold deck (used to show the card drawn to the player who draw).
      Parameters:
      who - the player who drew the card
      where - the draw type indicating where the card was drawn from
      kingdom - the symbol representing the kingdom
      card - the card that was drawn
